articles.title: CANADA STOCKS-TSX hits all-time high on tech boost - Reuters
articles.description: Canada's main stock index hit a record high in early trade on Monday, with technology stocks leading gains tracking Nasdaq.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
June 28 (Reuters) - Canadas main stock index hit a record high in early trade on Monday, with technology stocks leading gains tracking Nasdaq.
